channel.title: Chilling Tolerance on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Chilling Tolerance on funPlantGenes

item.title: COG2
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os01g67390 RAPdb gene ID: Os01g0899700 Gene Symbol: COG2 Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: CsBPC2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsBPC2 Gene Name: BASIC PENTACYSTEINE 2 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: CsBPC2 knockout reduced cucumber cold tolerance by increasing the chilling injury index, relative electrical conductivity and malondialdehyde (MDA) content and decreasing antioxidant enzyme activity.

item.title: GPAT
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GPAT Gene Name: glycerol-3-phosphate acyltransferase Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of Sweet Pepper Glycerol-3-Phosphate Acyltransferase Gene Enhanced Thermotolerance of Photosynthetic Apparatus in Transgenic Tobacco.

item.title: Hsftf20
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb428800 Gene Symbol: Hsftf20 Gene Name: HSF-transcription factor 20 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.title: LeCDJ1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LeCDJ1 Gene Name: DnaJ protein1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: The roles of a tomato (Solanum lycopersicum) chloroplast-targeted DnaJ protein (LeCDJ1), whose expression was upregulated by treatment at 4 and 42 °C, and with high light, NaCl, polyethylene glycol, and H2O2, were investigated here using sense and antisense transgenic tomatoes.

item.title: MdCIbHLH1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdCIbHLH1 Gene Name: Cold-Induced bHLH1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The cold-induced basic helix-loop-helix transcription factor gene MdCIbHLH1encodes an ICE-like protein in apple.

item.title: MeMYB2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MeMYB2 Gene Name: Genome: Manihot esculenta, v6.

item.title: OsRad51;OsRad51A1
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os11g40150 RAPdb gene ID: Os11g0615800 Gene Symbol: OsRad51 OsRad51A1 COLD11 Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: PpINH1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Prupe.5G112600 Gene Symbol: PpINH1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Prunus persica Functional Descriptions: PpINH1, an invertase inhibitor, interacts with vacuolar invertase PpVIN2 in regulating the chilling tolerance of peach fruit.

item.title: PpVIN2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PpVIN2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Prunus persica Functional Descriptions: PpINH1, an invertase inhibitor, interacts with vacuolar invertase PpVIN2 in regulating the chilling tolerance of peach fruit.

item.title: PtrbHLH
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PtrbHLH Gene Name: Basic Helix-Loop-Helix Transcription Factor Genome: Species: Citrus trifoliata Functional Descriptions: A Basic Helix-Loop-Helix Transcription Factor, PtrbHLH, of Poncirus trifoliata Confers Cold Tolerance and Modulates Peroxidase-Mediated Scavenging of Hydrogen Peroxide.

item.title: SlBRI1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlBRI1 Gene Name: BRASSINOSTEROID INSENSITIVE 1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of SlBRI1 driven by the Atrd29A promoter could increase the cold resistance of tomato plants during chilling stress but did not improve the expression of SlBRI1 and plant growth under normal conditions.

item.title: SlF3HL
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc03g080190 Gene Symbol: SlF3HL Gene Name: Genome: Tomato Genome version SL4.

item.title: SlGRAS4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc01g100200 Gene Symbol: SlGRAS4 Gene Name: GRAS transcription factor 4 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: SlGRAS4 mediates a novel regulatory pathway promoting chilling tolerance in tomato.

item.title: SlRbcS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlRbcS1 Gene Name: Genome: Tomato Genome version SL4.
